lines: 'TIS ALMOST TIME FOR THE LORD TO COME
1. Nshita yapwa Mfumu yalaisa, Ndeumfwa bantu baleti;
Ntanda ku mulu nasho shashima, Ubushiku bulu 'pepi no kuca.
Bu-shiku bwandi nomba bwalaca, Bu-shiku bwandi nomba bwalaca-,
Inshita naipwa Mfumu yalaisa; Teyanishisheni 'kwisa kwakwe.
2. Filangililo, mweshi, kasuba; Mu calo namu lwelele,
Mashiwi yafiko yatusoka; Filetwebe Mfumu ili mupepi.
Cifume ku misango yabipa, Citeyanishishe ku kwisa kwakwe.
4. Kabiyeni bonse mu tushila, Pamofye na mu misebo;
Mubalete bonse nefilema; Baiteyanishisho kwisa kwakwe.
